x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying rectangle x-locations

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vector of valuescontaining a "b" combined with a numeric value specifyingrectangle y-locations.The character vector will place rectangle y-locations relative tothe bottom of the most recently plotted plot according tothe units of the plotgardener page

width.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying rectangle widths

height.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying rectangle heights

just.description: Justification of rectangle relative to its (x, y) location.If there are two values, the first value specifies horizontal justificationand the second value specifies vertical justification.Possible string values are: \code{"left"}, \code{"right"},\code{"centre"}, \code{"center"}, \code{"bottom"}, and \code{"top"}.Default value is \code{just = "center"}. Options include: c("left", "top"), c("left", "bottom"), "left", c("right", "top"), c("right", "bottom"), "right", "top", "bottom", "center"

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, and \code{height} are only given asnumerics or numeric vectors.Default value is \code{default.units = "inches"}. Options include: "inches", "cm", "npc", "snpc", "native", "mm", "points"

linecolor.description: A character value specifying rectangle line color.Default value is \code{linecolor = "black"}

lwd.description: A numeric specifying rectangle line width.Default value is \code{lwd = 1}

lty.description: A numeric specifying rectangle line type.Default value is \code{lty = 1}

fill.description: A character value specifying rectangle fill color.Default value is \code{fill = NA}

alpha.description: Numeric value specifying color transparency.Default value is \code{alpha = 1}

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
